fillAllFieldsWarning: Please fill in all required fields.
confirmDeleteProductBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this product?
confirmDeleteQuoteBody: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this quote?
confirmBookingBody: According to accounting laws, this is a final action that cannot be deleted, only corrected.
errorTryAgain: An error occurred. Please try again.
inviteLinkCreatedBody: Send the following link to the person you want to invite. The link can only be used once.
teamMembersDescription: People with access to the company
inviteNewMemberDescription: Create a unique one-time link to send to the person you want to invite.
noTeamMembers: You haven't invited any team members yet.
heroSubtitle: From the first quote to the paid invoice and automatic bookkeeping. FlowBooks is the AI platform that gathers all your finances, so you can focus on what you do best.
mailSettingsFailed: Could not connect. Please check your credentials.
dangerZoneDescription: This action is irreversible. All associated data (invoices, products, etc.) will be permanently deleted.
manageExpenseCategories: Manage the categories used to classify your expenses.
defaultInvoiceTextDescription: This text (e.g., payment terms) is automatically added to all new invoices.
invoiceReminderSettingsDescription: Enable and set up automatic email reminders for unpaid invoices. Requires functional email settings.
emailClientSettingsDescription: Connect your company's email account to send and receive emails directly from FlowBooks.
overviewSettingsDescription: Choose which widgets to display on your overview page.
deleteAccountDescription: Your user will be permanently deleted. Company data will not be affected.
defaultInvoiceTextSaved: Default invoice text has been saved!
noCategoriesAdded: No categories have been added yet.
enterNewCategoryName: Enter new name for the category:
confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure? This cannot be undone.
invalidImageLink: Please provide a direct link to an image (jpg, png, etc.).
couldNotDeleteAccount: Could not delete the account. Please log out and log in again.
confirmDeleteAccount: Are you absolutely sure? Type 'DELETE' to confirm.
confirmDeleteCompany: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete "{companyName}"? This cannot be undone. Type the company name to confirm.
featuresTitle: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.
featuresSubtitle: We've built the tools that actually solve your problems, without unnecessary complexity.
featureBankConnectionDescription: Securely sync with your bank via Tink. FlowBooks automatically fetches your transactions, matches payments to invoices, and simplifies reconciliation.
featureReceiptScanningDescription: Snap a photo of a receipt and let our AI interpret the date, amount, vendor, and suggest an accounting category. Save time and avoid manual errors.
featureCrmDescription: Send beautiful quotes and follow deals from start to finish. All customer history, from first contact to paid invoice, is gathered in one place.
featureInvoicingDescription: Create and send professional invoices in under a minute. The system keeps track of which are unpaid, paid, and overdue.
featureInventoryDescription: Keep track of your products, purchase prices, and stock levels. Get a forecast of your inventory's potential sales value.
featureTaxDescription: Automatically generate documentation for your VAT reports and get a clear overview of your profits. Less stress when it's time to file.
ctaSubtitle: Create an account and discover how smooth it can be. It's free to get started.
footerText: © 2025 FlowBooks. Built for entrepreneurs, by entrepreneurs.
twoFactorAuthenticationDescription: Protect your account from unauthorized access by requiring a second verification method upon login.
